name: Grandpa's Story
description:
You've tirelessly tried to throw Grandpa his birthday party over and over and he just never seems to remember. This time, however, is going to be different. Last time he told you about a special cake his wife used to make, and all you have to do is find the recipe! The cake will be awesome, but might take a little more effort to get him to truly remember his 80th birthday...

-Controls-

Use the arrow-keys/WASD to move, and space to interact with objects. Cycle items with Left Shift and clear your hands with Left Control.
